DOC.brief_summary: To visually evaluate retention coverage Test Product ( ) ( TP ) face exercise compare full coverage observe prior exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Sunscreen During Exercise Under Conditions Profuse Sweating
DOC.criteria: Subjects may male female , age 1855 year inclusive . Subjects must capable understand provide write informed consent . Subjects must sign write confidentiality agreement include photography release form . Subjects must good general health judge specify licensed physician , indicate suitability participate study . Female subject must willing take rapid screen pregnancy test prior exercise session . Subjects must willing follow study instruction set forth protocol . Subjects must facial piercing ( ) . Subjects must Fitzpatrick Skin Type I , II , III . Subjects must receive use Investigational New Drug within last 30 day . Subjects must active participant another clinical subjective TP performance study within last 30 day unless authorized Sponsor . Subjects must know physical medical condition would preclude vigorous exercise Subjects must fiveminute rest pulse rate great 80 bpm . Subjects must take chronic medication vitamin , hormone replacement therapy , lowdose aspirin , oral contraceptive . Subjects must apply prescription overthecounter medicine face least 96 hour prior exercise session Subjects must know allergy sensitivity sunscreen product Cetaphil cleanser . Female subject must pregnant ( selfreported ) test positive use onsite pregnancy test . Female subject must nurse child . Subjects must smoke cigarette , pipe , cigar last 60 day . Subjects judgment Investigator condition would make study participation inappropriate . Subjects must member relative clinical trial staff Sponsor directly involve study .
